## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                            | Type                                             | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | -------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `overlap` | `overlap` | Whether the badge overlaps its parent. | `boolean`                                        | `false`     |
| `variant` | `variant` | The style of the badge.                | `"default" \| "error" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'default'` |
